Articles.Content: Recently started playing game. I went to land back onto kerbin and the entire planets textures began reloading and lagging the entire game. Eventually the olanet itself vanished into a black empty space, and when i went to land the craft exploded. Half an hour into the flight, and it bugged out and ruined it. Pls help
A new version of the console game will be available very soon, which will fix that problem.
I had a minor bug like that, the entire skybox disapeared. All the stars were missing.
